description: Windows 10 version 22H2 may encounter issues when attempting to install updates automatically, particularly for the WinRE component crucial for recovery scenarios. If the automatic update fails, users are advised to search for the update file in the C:\Windows\SoftwareDistribution\Download folder, which may have a hexadecimal name without an extension. Manual installation of the update has proven successful where automatic methods have failed, emphasizing the necessity of manual intervention to resolve update failures.
